breez_is_ready_to_receive_funds: Breez is ready to receive funds.
invoice_data_was_copied_to_your_clipboar: Invoice data was copied to your clipboard.
keep_breez_open_until_payment_is_complet: Keep Breez open until payment is completed.
a_setup_fee_is_applied_to_this_invoice: A setup fee of {satFee} ({fiatFee}) is applied to this invoice.
funds_were_successfully_sent_to_the_spec: Funds were successfully sent to the specified address.
please_wait_while_breez_is_sending_the_f: Please wait while Breez is sending the funds to the specified address.
backup_message: If you want to be able to restore your funds in case this mobile device or this app are no longer available (e.g. lost or stolen device or app uninstall), you are required to backup your information.
sign_in_icloud_message: Sign in to your iCloud account. On the Home screen, launch Settings, tap iCloud, and enter your Apple ID. Turn iCloud Drive on. If you don't have an iCloud account, tap Create a new Apple ID.
